EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Josh, I am so thrilled to hear that. Yes, feel free to give me a call at 6pm I will block off the time. Looking forward to connecting with you! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Joshua Greenberg [mailto:joshua@crmventures.com] Sent: Monday, April 30, 2012 10:07 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Call Follow Up Thanks Sara, I appreciated speaking with you on Friday and am very interested in starting with MBO. I have a couple colleagues who are also interested as well. Can I give you a call this evening at 6 to finalize the terms?On Fri, Apr 27, 2012 at 5:56 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote:Dear Josh , It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here. I have also attached a net cash estimate, please give me a ring when you have a moment to discuss. We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here. I will follow up with you as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
